special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Sky Rock enters, it deals 2 damage to each creature you don’t control.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this Expedition reaches stage 2, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Creatures you control have menace.
